pos_mean_info_list.mean: 时髦的；现代风格的；潇洒的
程式化的；按固定格式的
风格化；仿效…的风格（stylize的过去式和过去分词）
使…风格化；效仿…的风格（等于stylize）

word_mean_info__list.difference: 侧重指衣着、生活、行为和思想等的风尚，多含一时或一地流行的意味。
与fashion意义相当，可换用，但现代用以强调高雅。

word_group.brief_definition: 不时髦的, 不流行的, 落伍的
健康的生活方式
生活风格；生活方式；生活作风

bilingual.source: Each of these has a different style and design.
bilingual.target: 每一种都有不同的风格和设计。

bilingual.source: Compare the language, style and impact of writing.
bilingual.target: 比较语言、风格和写作的影响。

bilingual.source: It is a nice way to make your clothes suit your own special style.
bilingual.target: 这是让你的衣服适合你自己独特风格的好方法。

bilingual.source: Discuss and express preferences in terms of language, style and theme.
bilingual.target: 讨论并表达在语言、风格和主题方面的偏好。

bilingual.source: Do you think the sentences in the extract are written in a formal or an informal style?
bilingual.target: 你认为摘录中的句子是以正式还是非正式的风格写的？

bilingual.source: The architectural style of this city is very Western style.
bilingual.target: 这个城市的建筑风格很洋气。
她的风格非常独一无二。

list.abstract: style（英[staɪl]，美[staɪl]），英语单词，作名词为风格；样式；高雅。作动词为按特定形式设计；按特定形式制造；称呼。短语搭配有out of style（不时髦的）。例句为“Her clothes are out of style.（她的衣服过时了。）” style名词类近义词有mode、description等，动词类design、engineer。
《style》是美国流行女歌手泰勒·斯威夫特（Taylor Swift）演唱的一首英语流行歌曲，词曲由泰勒·斯威夫特、Ali Payami、马克斯·马丁和舒斯特尔编写，音乐由马克斯·马丁、舒斯特尔、Ali Payami制作。该歌曲作为推广专辑的第三支单曲，于2015年2月10日通过大机器唱片公司发布，被收录在泰勒·斯威夫特于2014年10月27日发行的第五张录音室专辑《1989》。

yingyinNormal.en: Oh. Maybe you should say it is, because London style sounds nice.
yingyinNormal.zh: 也许你应该说有，因为“伦敦风格”听起来不错。

yingyinNormal.en: Hey, Moon, you gave me the wrong list. Cheesy pop's not exactly my style.
yingyinNormal.zh: 嘿，伯乐，你推荐的歌不对。廉价的流行歌曲不是我的风格。

yingyinNormal.en: Isn't that what happened with you and the bride's maid? Yeah. I call that London style.
yingyinNormal.zh: 那不是发生在你和伴娘身上吗？对，我叫它“伦敦风格”。

yingyinNormal.en: Style. I'm glad you brought that up. Now, let's see. There. Isn't this a great color for you?
yingyinNormal.zh: 风格。这可提醒我了，你就穿这件，这颜色绝配，太适合你了。

yingyinNormal.en: There's no taste, no style. No design. So unless they're shackling you here, why do you stay?
yingyinNormal.zh: 这里没品位，没风格，也没有设计，所以，除非他们把你绑在这里了，你干嘛还在这儿？

yingyinNormal.en: For the new urban middle class, the summer brings a new western-style holiday into their calendar: the beach holiday.
yingyinNormal.zh: 对于都市新晋中产阶级来说，炎炎夏日带来了一个新的西方风格的节日：海滨度假日。

yingyinNormal.en: And you have no style or sense of fashion.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你对时尚即不追求，也没见解。

yingyinNormal.en: It's a bit like making western-style meatballs, but with Chinese seasonings.
yingyinNormal.zh: 和做西式肉丸有点像，但用的是中式调料。

yingyinNormal.en: Oh, come on, it's fine. We'll just put it all on the table, you know, family style.
yingyinNormal.zh: 来不，没事儿的。我们全部摊在桌上分享就好，就像家庭聚餐式的。

yingyinNormal.en: And the style number, and the invoice number, and the shipping date. Good. Any questions so far?
yingyinNormal.zh: 型号，发货号码，和出货日期，很好，有问题吗？

yingyinNormal.en: I'm coming at you with crazy feet. What do you do about crazy feet? All right, Come on. I'm a blur. I'm a blur. You've never seen bear style. You've only seen praying mantis. Or monkey style. Or I could come at you snickety-snake.
yingyinNormal.zh: 看我的无影脚，没辙了吧? 来吧，看不清我的脚步吧? 没见识过熊猫拳吧? 你大概只看过螳螂拳，猴拳，蛇手刁手。

yingyinNormal.en: Gangnam Style is another great example of how that just took over and became huge worldwide world pop phenomenon.
yingyinNormal.zh: 江南style是另一个刚刚成功的好例子，它刚刚成为世界范围的流行现象。

yingyinNormal.en: No, if he was eating us, he'd be chewing us up and we'd be going down there. This is what you call riding in style.
yingyinNormal.zh: 不，如果他想吃我们的话，他会把我们嚼碎了，然后从那里咽下去。这就是传说中的拉风的坐骑。
yingyinNormal.videoNameEn: 《The SpongeBob Movie: Sponge Out of Water》

yingyinNormal.en: Over the decades, Las Vegas grew into a kinda neon Camelot, whose casinos and Rat Pack style has become almost legendary.
yingyinNormal.zh: 几十年来，拉斯维加斯成为霓虹灯满布的圣城风云场景，还有传奇的 Rat Pack 式生活。

yingyinNormal.en: Real Chinese style. There you are. Just because you're in England you don't have to use a knife and fork. Oh yeah, we'll use chopsticks!
yingyinNormal.zh: 真正的中式作风。就是这样。即使你在英国并不意味着一定要用刀叉。是的，我们会用筷子。

yingyinNormal.en: Well, wait. After I stopped laughing and the man picked him up and hugged him predator-style, I saw Tommy's teeth had busted through his cheek.
yingyinNormal.zh: 还没说完呢，我止住笑声后，那男人把他扶起来，用恋童癖的方式拥抱他，我看见汤米的牙齿从脸颊冒出来。

yingyinNormal.en: Okay. You know, I don't want to criticize your rhetorical style, but we'd be a lot further along in this conversation if you'd begun with that thought.
yingyinNormal.zh: 没事啊，我不想评价你说话的修辞手法，但要是你能开门见山地说，我们可能已经谈得很深了。

yingyinNormal.en: Ms. What was our struggle for? And not just any "Ms. Pac-man," but an original 1982 fully reconditioned podium-style unit, with original coin return. They're even throwing in the stool.
yingyinNormal.zh: 是女士，刚刚纠正你多久了？不是普通的“吃豆女士游戏机”而是1982年原装修复的矮款，带有原始的退币口，他们还送了凳子呢。

exam_freq_info.chinese: 风度; 格调; 气派; 品味

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: n. 时装和美容行业有创造性的从业者；服装道具设计师；以典雅的工作而著称的人；发型师；时装设计师；追求文体风格的作家；具有优雅风度者
adj. 新式的；时髦的；时髦高雅的

word_family.mean: n. 风格；样式；高雅；风度；气派；棒状物体；文体；发型

sense_info_list.en: the particular way in which sth is done

examination_example.sentence: Children respond differently to the same <highlight>style</highlight> of parenting.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 孩子对同样的养育方式有不同的反应。

examination_example.sentence: Sometimes parents get exhausted and frustrated and are unable to maintain a tolerant and composed <highlight>style</highlight> with their kids.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 有时父母会感到疲惫和沮丧，无法对孩子保持宽容和沉着的作风。

examination_example.sentence: It is only the Queen who has preserved the monarchy's reputation with her rather ordinary granny <highlight>style</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 只有英国女王以她平易近人、“老奶奶”式的行为方式保住了王室的声誉。

sense_info_list.en: a particular design of sth; the features of a book, painting, building, etc. that make it typical of a particular author, artist, historical period, etc.

examination_example.sentence: He had such a pleasant, readable <highlight>style</highlight> that one might think that anyone could imitate it.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他的风格如此令人愉快，可读性强，以至于人们可能会认为任何人都可以模仿它。

examination_example.sentence: The elaborate French Second Empire <highlight>style</highlight> design by Alfred Mullett was selected.
examination_example.sentence_trans: Alfred Mullett精心设计的法兰西第二帝国风格设计被选中。

examination_example.sentence: For all their diversity of <highlight>styles</highlight>, these gardens speak of various other fundamental urges, beyond that of decoration and creative expression.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 尽管这些花园风格多样，但在装饰和创造性表达之外，它们还表达了各种其他的基本要求。

sense_info_list.en: the quality of being elegant and made to a high standard
sense_info_list.zh: 风度; 格调; 气派; 品味

examination_example.sentence: So, adapt your <highlight>style</highlight> accordingly to type.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 因此，根据类型调整你的风格。

examination_example.sentence: The point of a <highlight>style</highlight> upgrade isn't to become more vain or to spend more time fussing over what to wear.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 风格升级的意义不在于变得更加虚荣或花更多的时间为穿什么而烦恼。

examination_example.sentence: Millennials, it seems, face the paradox of being the least formal generation yet the most conscious of <highlight>style</highlight> and personal branding.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 千禧一代似乎面临着这样一个悖论:他们是最不正式的一代，却最注重风格和个人品牌。

word_usage.usage: style作动词时，多作及物动词，其后接名词或代词，如：style the new car 设计这辆新车。

exam_freq_info.chinese: 风度; 仪表; 气派

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: adj. 新式的；时髦的；时髦高雅的

word_family.mean: n. 风格；样式；高雅；风度；气派；棒状物体；文体；发型

sense_info_list.en: a distinctive appearance, typically determined by the principles according to which something is designed; the correct use of language

examination_example.sentence: It facilitates the creation of one's own writing <highlight>style</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 它有助于创造自己的写作风格。

examination_example.sentence: The correct interpretation of this statement is not about copying, but rather about creating your own <highlight>style</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 对这句话的正确解释不是抄袭，而是创造自己的风格。

examination_example.sentence: When you study an author's writing style, don't stop on a single one, but explore numerous <highlight>styles</highlight> instead.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 当你研究作者的写作风格时，不要停留在一个风格上，而是要探索众多的风格。

examination_example.sentence: Many have argued that the women designers of this time were able to project their own clothing values into a new <highlight>style</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 许多人认为，这个时代的女性设计师能够将自己的服装价值观念设计成新的风格。

sense_info_list.en: a method, manner, or quality that is felt to be very respectable, fashionable, or proper

examination_example.sentence: They might not have even reflected on what good management looks like and how it would influence their own management <highlight>style</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他们甚至可能没有思考过什么是好的管理，以及它会如何影响他们自己的管理方式。

sense_info_list.zh: 风度; 仪表; 气派

exam_freq_info.chinese: 风度; 仪表; 气派

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全四级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: adj. 新式的；时髦的；时髦高雅的

word_family.mean: n. 风格；样式；高雅；风度；气派；棒状物体；文体；发型

sense_info_list.en: a method; manner; or quality that is felt to be very respectable; fashionable; or proper
a distinctive appearance; typically determined by the principles according to which something is designed; the correct use of language

examination_example.sentence: They have a distinctive <highlight>style</highlight> of handwriting.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他们有一种独特的笔迹。

examination_example.sentence: The International Civil Aviation Organization suggests that countries use a suitable type, size and <highlight>style</highlight> for official documents like passports.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 国际民用航空组织建议各国在护照等官方文件中使用合适的类型、大小和样式。

examination_example.sentence: The <highlight>style</highlight> was fashionable.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这风格是时尚的。

sense_info_list.en: an individual way of behaving or doing something

examination_example.sentence: Such cats displayed more aggressive and anxious behavioural <highlight>styles</highlight> as well as more stress-related sickness.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这样的猫表现出更强的攻击性和焦虑的行为方式，以及更多与压力有关的疾病。

examination_example.sentence: Each artist has their own individual <highlight>style</highlight> but all artists share a common aim.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 每个艺术家都有自己的风格，但所有的艺术家都有一个共同的目标。

examination_example.sentence: The researchers conclude that cats hunting <highlight>style</highlight> may have developed based on their common-sense abilities to infer where prey is, using their hearing.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 研究人员得出结论，猫咪的狩猎方式可能是基于它们的常识能力而发展的，这种能力是利用它们的听力来推断猎物在哪里的。

sense_info_list.zh: 风度; 仪表; 气派

examination_example.sentence: Since my overall <highlight>style</highlight> was quite minimal, I thought and hoped a whole renovation wouldn't be too difficult.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 由于我的整体风格非常简单，我认为并希望整个翻新不会太难。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2015-2022年全国卷高考试卷，包括阅读、完形、单选、填空、听力、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

sense_info_list.en: a distinctive appearance, typically determined by the principles according to which something is designed; the correct use of language

examination_example.sentence: There is speculation (推测) that it's not the <highlight>style</highlight> of music that makes it so good for your heart health.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 有人推测不是音乐风格对心脏健康有好处。

examination_example.sentence: Silent onstage communication is key, and each pianist has their own <highlight>style</highlight> of “nodding” .
examination_example.sentence_trans: 无声的舞台交流是关键，每个钢琴家都有自己的“点头”风格。

examination_example.sentence: I recommend that you find your way in <highlight>style</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我建议你找到自己的风格。

sense_info_list.en: a method, manner, or quality that is felt to be very respectable, fashionable, or proper

examination_example.sentence: I ran the risk of losing those students who had a different <highlight>style</highlight> of thinking.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我冒着失去那些有着不同思维方式的学生的风险。

examination_example.sentence: To many people, saving lives is part of the job but <highlight>styling</highlight> hair is an extra and should be rewarded.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 对很多人来说，拯救生命是工作的一部分，但美发是额外的工作，应该得到奖励。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2018-2021年全国重点省市中考试卷，包括听力、阅读、完形、单选、填空、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

word_level_phrase_info.brief_definition: 不时髦的；不流行的；落伍的
生活风格；生活方式；生活作风

examination_example.sentence: Her clothes are out of <highlight>style</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 她的衣服过时了。

examination_example.sentence: A new <highlight>style</highlight> of schoolbags has appeared in recent years.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 近年来出现了一种新型书包。

examination_example.sentence: A healthy life <highlight>style</highlight> can help prevent diabetes.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 健康的生活方式有助于预防糖尿病。
